　これが私が感じたやつなのかな？
　なんか、すごそうな剣だねー♪』
column2:
<Al>
"We haven't seen a blue treasure chest before...
 Maybe it was that sword that I sensed? It looks
 really strong♪"

<Save Event Locations>:
貴方が宝箱から手に入れた剣をアルはまじまじと見つめる。
効果は、装備することで全能力+20％………
すごそう、ではなく本当にすごい剣のようだ。
column2:
Al closely looked at the sword you picked up from the
chest. You looked over it and found that it has 「All
Stats +20%」. It didn't just look strong. It was an
actual strong sword.

<Save Event Locations>:
<アル>
『その効果ってそんなに強いの？
　おおー、よかったね。\n[1]♪』
column2:
<Al>
"Is that effect so powerful? Well, that's great because
 it's your sword now, \n[1]♪"

<Save Event Locations>:
そう言うアルに、
君のおかげだと貴方はアルに告げた。

that you found it.

column2:
"This road leads to a danger area where monsters get
 suddenly really strong. Only players who have won two
 matches at the Colosseum can pass."

<Save Event Locations>:
『無用な犠牲を出さないため……
　これはバンガードの意思だからね。
　分かってくれない？』
column2:
"This is a rule that Vanguard have set to prevent
 unnecessary victims. Please understand."

<Save Event Locations>:
<アル>
『うぅーん…この先の敵、そんなに強いのかな？
　この人の言う通り、また後でこよっか。』
column2:
<Al>
"Hmm... Is it really such a dangerous area? Looks like
 our only option is to do as she says and come back at
 a later point."

<Save Event Locations>:
『ん……確かに勝利の証を確認したよ。　
　繰り返しになるが、この先の敵は強いから。
　油断しないようにね？』
column2:
"Mmh... Yes, I've confirmed that you have the medals.
 I'm going to remind you one more time: The monsters
 in the next area are really strong, so don't let your
 guard down."

<Save Event Locations>:
<アル>

　さっきの人も言ってたように、油断しないようにね！』
column2:

 careful like that person said!"

"The monsters in this forest look like plants, so I
 tried using fire magic against them, but it didn't
 deal any extra damage. Isn't that cheating?"

<Al>
"That's right! Plants should be weak to fire♪ But that
 doesn't seem to apply here. I wonder why?"
